# Friendli

Use `friendli/<model>` with VoltAgent's model router.

## Quick start

```ts
import { Agent } from "@voltagent/core";

const agent = new Agent({
  name: "friendli-agent",
  instructions: "You are a helpful assistant",
  model: "friendli/LGAI-EXAONE/EXAONE-4.0.1-32B",
});
```

## Environment variables

- `FRIENDLI_TOKEN`

## Provider package

`@ai-sdk/openai-compatible`

This provider uses the OpenAI-compatible adapter.

## Default base URL

`https://api.friendli.ai/serverless/v1`

You can override the base URL by setting `FRIENDLI_BASE_URL`.

## Provider docs

- https://friendli.ai/docs/guides/serverless_endpoints/introduction
